title: What is Authentication?
description: Learn what authentication is and why it's important in apps.
content:
Authentication is how websites or apps identify who you are. Think of it as a digital 'ID check'. Logging in is the most common form of authentication.

In this tutorial, we’ll teach you how to build authentication yourself. You'll see small snippets of code — not a full working system yet. By the end, you'll understand how each piece works.
